# Fill Modes

**API Collection**

These constants determine how the timed object behaves once its active duration has completed. They are used with the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/fillMode] property.

## Constants

- **removed**: The receiver is removed from the presentation when the animation is completed.
- **forwards**: The receiver remains visible in its final state when the animation is completed.
- **backwards**: The receiver clamps values before zero to zero when the animation is completed.
- **both**: The receiver clamps values at both ends of the object’s time space

items.description: The receiver is removed from the presentation when the animation is completed.
